Hi there, Roku. I think we have a match!

I love collaborating, I'm an idea-machine, and I'm excited to make a difference.

Career Highlights relevant to role:

  • First designer at agency startup. Helped grow to 3-person design team. But, also worked with larger companies like Fidelity.
  • Strong interest in scaling design. Participaged in year-long project implementing a pattern library & design system. More here.
  • Sat in developer role. Knowing semantic HTML/CSS makes communicating between engineering teams smooth.
  • Brought critique to agency. As a low-ego designer, I believe design is a team sport.
